with lagging brand affinity in the college market As an active part of the team I created relevant articles promotions and community events to gain followers generate traffic and promote Dell products Examples include an Awkward Family Photo event as well as Technology Trivia games I was known for my ability to learn new things quickly and through weekly conference calls with the college team we
